description: Our old National Stadium has served our sports fans well, but is showing its age. The Ministry of Sports has proposed to build a new stadium in its place, but it is a costly venture, and perhaps we could make better use of the allocated funds.

options.description: It's a matter of prestige! We have to build it.
I'm not sure if now's the time for this. Maybe a small renovation should suffice.
No way! We have more important things to spend money on.

title: New National Stadium
